comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm out. I spent enough time out in the sun over the weekend between Olivia's new wading pool and Coors Field. Have fun.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: SB, I love that you're blocking out the Frenz' calendars for R&R. Pre-emptive strikes are always a good idea (the Bush administration notwithstanding). A logical next step: Can you get started on my home calendar as well? You'll have to get the password from my wife somehow. Use your guile/charm/whatever. Time's-a-wasting!
